variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: OABGNINS
variable.description: Month/year patient began using insulin

variable.name: OABABYDU
variable.description: Baby's due date

variable.name: OAPREVID
variable.description: Previous ID number

variable.name: OAPREVIN
variable.description: Previous initials

variable.name: OAREASIN
variable.description: Reason for ineligibility

variable.name: OAADA
variable.description: How did patient hear of DCCT trial: local chapter of ADA

variable.name: OAJDF
variable.description: How did patient hear of DCCT trial: local chapter of JDF

variable.name: OANEWS
variable.description: How did patient hear of DCCT trial: advertisement in newspaper

variable.name: OAMAGJ
variable.description: How did patient hear of DCCT trial: advertisement in magazine/journal

variable.name: OANEWSJ
variable.description: How did patient hear of DCCT trial: article in newspaper or journal

variable.name: OARADIO
variable.description: How did patient hear of DCCT trial: radio or TV announcement

variable.name: OAPOSTER
variable.description: How did patient hear of DCCT trial: poster at health care center

variable.name: OADOCTOR
variable.description: How did patient hear of DCCT trial: referred by private physician

variable.name: OAC1OTHR
variable.description: How did patient hear of DCCT trial: other source of information

variable.name: OAC2
variable.description: How did patient hear of DCCT trial: referred by interactive telephone

variable.name: SEX
variable.description: Patient's gender

variable.name: OAAGE
variable.description: Patient's age

variable.name: OA40PLUS
variable.description: Is patient over 40 years old?

variable.name: OALESS13
variable.description: Is patient less than 13 years old?

variable.name: OAIDDM
variable.description: Has patient been diagnosed with Insulin Dependent Diabetes Mellitus (IDDM)?

variable.name: OADXTIME
variable.description: How many years since diagnosis of IDDM was established?

variable.name: OADX15YR
variable.description: Has patient been diagnosed more than 15 years ago?

variable.name: OADX1YR
variable.description: Has patient been diagnosed less than one year ago?

variable.name: OAMOVE
variable.description: Does patient plan to move away from North America?

variable.name: OAPREGN1
variable.description: Is patient pregnant now?

variable.name: OAPREGN2
variable.description: Does patient plan to become pregnant?

variable.name: OAPUMP
variable.description: Does patient have a history of previous insulin pump use?

variable.name: OAMDI
variable.description: Does patient have a history of previous MDI (Multiple Daily Injections) use?

variable.name: OALASER
variable.description: Does patient have a history of photocoagulation?

variable.name: OAMEDIC
variable.description: Has patient been diagnosed with chronic disease requiring medication?

variable.name: OAMEDCON
variable.description: Does patient have a medical condition that excludes him/her?

variable.name: OARESTRT
variable.description: Is patient a restart?

variable.name: OAELIGIB
variable.description: Is patient potentially eligible?

variable.name: OAEXCLPT
variable.description: Type of exclusion decision

variable.name: OAINELMV
variable.description: Ineligible because of: moving away

variable.name: OAINELTM
variable.description: Ineligible because of: time commitment

variable.name: OAINELTR
variable.description: Ineligible because of: randomization/treatment group

variable.name: OAINELIN
variable.description: Ineligible because of: lack of interest

variable.name: OAINELSP
variable.description: Ineligible because of: lack family support

variable.name: OAINELOT
variable.description: Ineligible because of: other reason

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: Patient ID number
